summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for shipments associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein and Jeanne Breman Financial Trust Company. It includes specific shipment details, charges, and discounts applied to various packages sent between March 12 and March 19, 2004.
